mapper.select: WITH RECRUITVIEW AS ( SELECT RCRT_NO, RCRT_TITLE, COMPANY_NM, COM.COMPANY_ID FROM RECRUIT RE LEFT OUTER JOIN COMPANY COM ON RE.COMPANY_ID = COM.COMPANY_ID ), INTRVIEW AS ( SELECT INTE.INTR_NO, INTREV_NO, APL_NO, RCRT_NO,INTERV_PASS, INTERV_WDATE, INTERV_APPROVAL FROM INTERVIEW_REVIEW INTE LEFT OUTER JOIN INTERVIEW_SCHD SC ON INTE.INTR_NO = SC.INTR_NO ) SELECT COUNT(*) FROM INTRVIEW INTR LEFT OUTER JOIN RECRUITVIEW RE ON INTR.RCRT_NO =RE.RCRT_NO WHERE COMPANY_ID = #{variousCondition.companyId} AND INTERV_APPROVAL = 'Y'

WITH RECRUITVIEW AS ( SELECT RCRT_NO, RCRT_TITLE, COMPANY_NM, COM.COMPANY_ID FROM RECRUIT RE LEFT OUTER JOIN COMPANY COM ON RE.COMPANY_ID = COM.COMPANY_ID ), INTRVIEW AS ( SELECT INTE.INTR_NO, INTREV_NO, APL_NO, RCRT_NO,INTERV_PASS, INTERV_WDATE, INTERV_APPROVAL FROM INTERVIEW_REVIEW INTE LEFT OUTER JOIN INTERVIEW_SCHD SC ON INTE.INTR_NO = SC.INTR_NO ) SELECT DISTINCT INTR_NO , INTREV_NO , APL_NO , INTR.RCRT_NO , INTERV_PASS , INTERV_APPROVAL , TO_CHAR(INTERV_WDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') "intervWdate" , COMPANY_NM , RCRT_TITLE FROM INTRVIEW INTR LEFT OUTER JOIN RECRUITVIEW RE ON INTR.RCRT_NO =RE.RCRT_NO WHERE COMPANY_ID = #{variousCondition.companyId} AND INTERV_APPROVAL = 'Y'

WITH RCRTVIEW AS( SELECT A.INTR_NO, B.RCRT_TITLE FROM INTERVIEW_SCHD A INNER JOIN RECRUIT B ON A.RCRT_NO = B.RCRT_NO ) SELECT INTREV_NO , A.INTR_NO , RCRT_TITLE , INTERV_OVRL_EVLTN , INTERV_DIFFICULTY , INTERVIEW_TYPICAL , INTERV_PERSONNEL , INTERV_PROCESS , INTERV_QUESTION , INTERV_TIP , INTERV_PASS , TO_CHAR(INTERV_WDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') "intervWdate" , INTERV_APPROVAL , INTERV_REPORT FROM INTERVIEW_REVIEW A INNER JOIN RCRTVIEW B ON A.INTR_NO = B.INTR_NO WHERE INTREV_NO = #{intrevNo}

SELECT P.point_pmtno, P.users_id, P.ticket_no, P.pmt_methdno, P.point_pdate, P.point_hold, P.point_charge, P.point_use, P.point_remain, P.point_record, T.ticket_name, T.ticket_period, (P.point_pdate + T.ticket_period-1) AS ticketExpired FROM pointpay P JOIN ticketmnmt T ON P.ticket_no = T.ticket_no WHERE P.users_id = #{usersId} AND TRUNC(SYSDATE) >= TRUNC(point_pdate) AND TRUNC(SYSDATE) <= TRUNC(P.point_pdate + T.ticket_period-1)
SELECT mem_division FROM member WHERE mem_id=#{usersId}
